JP-Foundation.title: Jolly Phonics Foundation - Groups 1-3
learning_objectives: Master basic letter-sound correspondences for s a t i p n c/k e h r m d g o u l f b
Develop basic blending skills for CVC words
Practice letter formation for workplace documentation

assessment_plan.baseline: Letter recognition and basic sound knowledge
assessment_plan.formative: Daily sound checks and blending practice

JP-M1-Adults-ESL.title: Jolly Phonics Month 1 – Adult Vocational ESL
prerequisites: Completed Groups 1–3: s a t i p n | c/k e h r m d | g o u l f b
learning_objectives: Consolidate letter-sound knowledge per Jolly order (42 sounds) with adult-relevant contexts
Improve letter formation and legibility tied to workplace documentation
Blend learned sounds to read job-related words and phrases
Segment workplace vocabulary for accurate spelling in forms and reports
Introduce and practice tricky words relevant to safety and operations
esl_adaptations: Use multisensory actions judiciously with adult-appropriate visuals and contexts
Embed tasks in workplace scenarios (forms, signage, shift notes, HSE briefings)
Model pronunciation and minimal pairs relevant to American English accent goals

group_4.focus: Long vowel patterns and consonant extensions

assessment_plan.baseline: Review quiz on Groups 1–3 at start of Week 2
assessment_plan.formative: Daily dictation, blending/segmenting checks, exit tickets
assessment_plan.summative: End-of-week quizzes and a month-end phonics+reading assessment
assessment_plan.pronunciation: Weekly short oral check on target sounds and minimal pairs
